attributes.title: The Dreaded Nomad
attributes.caption: The hunt is on for the devious bringer of dark magic: The Nomad of Nowhere. Captain Toth, along with her bright-eyed companion Skout, are hot on the trail of the most wanted man in the world.
attributes.description: The hunt is on for the devious bringer of dark magic: The Nomad of Nowhere. Captain Toth, along with her bright-eyed companion Skout, are hot on the trail of the most wanted man in the world. But when Skout comes face-to-face with the sought-after bounty, she is forced into a difficult situation.

attributes.title: Bliss Hill
attributes.caption: Toth and Skout return to Don Paragon with bad news, where Red Manuel takes the opportunity to propose another approach to get what they want. Meanwhile, the Nomad tries to help a town in need.
attributes.description: Toth and Skout return to Don Paragon with bad news, where Red Manuel takes the opportunity to propose another approach to get what they want. Meanwhile, the Nomad tries to help a town in need.

attributes.title: Trouble on Purpose
attributes.caption: A ruthless bounty hunter descends upon Bliss Hill in search of the Nomad.
attributes.description: A ruthless bounty hunter descends upon Bliss Hill in search of the Nomad. Toth's mission to the Outskirts makes her grow impatient. The Nomad must decide whether to help the people who ran him out of town.

attributes.title: The Twindleweed Brothers Traveling Circus
attributes.caption: Nomad stumbles upon a traveling circus -- or rather, it stumbles upon him. By chance, Skout and Toth also happen to be enjoying the festivities, and things get even worse when all the performers are former bounty hunters to boot.
attributes.description: Nomad stumbles upon a traveling circus -- or rather, it stumbles upon him. By chance, Skout and Toth also happen to be enjoying the festivities, and things get even worse when all the performers are former bounty hunters to boot. At least they serve cotton candy.
attributes.display_title: S1:E4 - The Twindleweed Brothers Traveling Circus

attributes.title: The Kindness of Strangers
attributes.caption: Nomad crosses paths with a friendly undertaker who harbors him from Toth and Skout. Trusting his word, Nomad takes the undertaker up on his offer for safe passage across the desert, but it turns out this morbid man has his own plans for the Nomad...
attributes.description: Nomad crosses paths with a friendly undertaker who harbors him from Toth and Skout. Trusting his word, Nomad takes the undertaker up on his offer for safe passage across the desert, but it turns out this morbid man has his own plans for the Nomad...

attributes.title: El Rey
attributes.caption: Toth and Skout chase the Nomad into a sandstorm. Seeking refuge, the Nomad stumbles upon an abandoned fort, and curiously encounters visions of a time long ago. Meanwhile, Toth squares off with a  beast that thrives in the harsh sandstorms.
attributes.description: Toth and Skout chase the Nomad into a sandstorm. Seeking refuge, the Nomad stumbles upon an abandoned fort, and curiously encounters visions of a time long ago. Meanwhile, Toth squares off with a  beast that thrives in the harsh sandstorms.

attributes.title: Eagle Canyon
attributes.caption: The Governor of the West makes a surprise visit to Don Paragon, putting him in a tough situation.
attributes.description: The Governor of the West makes a surprise visit to Don Paragon, putting him in a tough situation. Nomad tries to help a creature in need. Skout tries to help Toth, but it leads to an unwanted outcome.

attributes.title: End of the Line
attributes.caption: The Nomad happens upon a train station out in the desert. Figuring it'd get him away from those hunting him, he decides to sneak aboard
attributes.description: The Nomad happens upon a train station out in the desert. Figuring it'd get him away from those hunting him, he decides to sneak aboard. At the same time, Skout, who is also looking to run from her problems, also boards the train. Meanwhile, Toth comes across Toro's Champion, hot on the Nomad's trail...

attributes.title: Compass
attributes.caption: The chase is on! Nomad and Skout do their best to lose Toro's Champion, but he's always hot on their heels somehow.
attributes.description: The chase is on! Nomad and Skout do their best to lose Toro's Champion, but he's always hot on their heels somehow. Toth begins to employ some morally gray tactics to get information on her search. Nomad must decide if should keep running.

attributes.title: The Witch and The Knight
attributes.caption: Memories of a beloved friend from the distant past come back to the Nomad...
attributes.description: Memories of a beloved friend from the distant past come back to the Nomad...
attributes.display_title: S1:E10 - The Witch and The Knight

attributes.title: The Red Carpet
attributes.caption: Toth returns to the Oasis as Don Paragon gloats over his new captives.
attributes.description: Toth returns to the Oasis as Don Paragon gloats over his new captives.

attributes.title: Fiesta
attributes.caption: The Nomad rides into battle for the people of the Oasis. Don Paragon takes extreme measures to keep his prize.
attributes.description: The Nomad rides into battle for the people of the Oasis. Don Paragon takes extreme measures to keep his prize.
